document.full_text: the black sea region of abkhazia, which considers itself independent but is claimed by georgia, won recognition tuesday from a second south pacific island, the republic of vanuatu.
document.title: europe: the caucasus: new allies for breakaway region
lines_and_colors: the black sea region of abkhazia, which considers itself independent but is claimed by georgia, won recognition tuesday from a second south pacific island, the republic of vanuatu.
